directions.text: Fry the onions gently in the oil until they are just lightly golden, approximately 10 minutes.
Add the Garlic and Ginger.  Fry gently for 5 minutes more.
Add the spices and fry for 1 more minute.
Add tomatoes and fry for 5 more minutes.
Add tamarind and fry for 1 more minute.
Add Coconut milk and water.  Mix thoroughly.
Turn up the heat and bring it to a boil.
Add the green Chillies and turn the heat down to medium.
Cover the pot and simmer for about 10 minutes.
Cut the fish into 1-1/2 X 1-1/2 X 3" chunks, or whatever size you want.
Add the Fish and the Salt and bring to a boil.  Turn it to medium  and simmer gently for 5 minutes, covered.
Check that the fish is cooked.  Do not overcook.

ingredients.ingredient: Onion, large, chopped as finely as possible
Tomato, fresh or canned, chopped finely

ingredients.comment: (We like Native Forest Brand Organic.  Chaokoh comes in 2nd place.)
